overview: Charlie would rather stay in reading classic literature or watching a documentary than hit the bars trying to meet the so-called "man of her dreams." In fact, she's always telling her man-eater best friend Madeline that all the guys worth dating are either dead, gay, or fictional. When Madeline drags Charlie to a unique singles mixer, Charlie meets a bunch of guys who are just her type-and is surprised by what she finds.
tagline: A short film about all the guys you never thought you'd meet
title: Dead. Gay. Fictional
